name: Rabadons Deathcap
description: Grant 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Infinity Edge
description: Grant 75%  Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of  Critical Strike Chance above 100% become +1% Critical Strike Damage

name: Cavalier Emblem
description: The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

name: Frozen Heart
description: Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: Combat start: Shoot a beam that increases the maxiumum Mana of affected enemies by 35% until they cast.

name: Cannoneer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Cannoneer trait.

name: Astral Emblem
description: The holder gains the Astral trait.

name: Redemption
description: Heal allies within 1 hex for 12% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

name: Whispers Emblem
description: The holder gains the Whispers trait.

name: Trainer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Trainer trait.

name: Zephyr
description: Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Goldmancers Staff
description: Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold) and a chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

name: Determined Investor
description: After dying during combat 7 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and 15 gold.

name: Moguls Mail
description: Grant 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 5 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times. At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

name: Gamblers Blade
description: Gain 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 80). Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

name: Needlessly Big Gem
description: Once per combat: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, grant 1 gold per 3 living allies, and each living ally deals 1% more damage per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold).

name: Dravens Axe
description: Gain 1 Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold). Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 8 gold and 1 item component(s).

name: Diamond Hands
description: Once per combat: At 66% Health and 33% Health, become invulnerable for 2 seconds and grant 1 gold.

name: Crown Of Champions
description: Every 4 seconds, the next attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank in true damage.

name: Zeke Herald
description: Unique: Combat start: summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Thief Gloves
description: Each round: equip 2 random items. Improves with player level! Consumes 3 item slots.

name: Guinsoo Rageblade
description: Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks!

name: Jade Emblem
description: The holder gains the Jade trait.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 3 hexes have 50% reduced Magic Resist. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 250% of their maximum Mana. Aura item

name: Tempest Emblem
description: The holder gains the Tempest trait.

name: Dragon Claw
description: Grant 120 bonus Magic Resist (including components). Every 2 seconds, Regenerate 1.2% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder. If the holder is a Dragon, increase ALL bonuses and effects by 20%.

name: Warrior Emblem
description: The holder gains the Warrior trait.

name: Assassin Emblem
description: The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: Mystic Emblem
description: The holder gains the Mystic trait.

name: Banshee Claw
description: Combat start: Grant a shield to the holder and 2 adjacent allies in the same row. It blocks the first enemy Ability, up to 600 damage. Aura item

name: Blue Buff
description: Unique: Grant 50 bonus starting Mana. After casting an Ability, set Mana to 20.

name: Chain Vest
description: +20rmor

name: B.F. Sword
description: %i:scaleAD% +@AD@ Attack Damage

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: Gain 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Grants 80 Armor (including components). Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by an attack, deal 75/100/150  magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

name: Guild Emblem
description: The holder gains the Guild trait.

name: Swiftshot Emblem
description: The holder gains the Swiftshot trait.

name: Legend Emblem
description: The holder gains the Legend trait.

name: Recurve Bow
description: 10% Attack Speed

name: Giant Slayer
description: Abilities and attacks deal 20% more damage. If the target has more than 2200 maximum Health, deal 45% more damage.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Unique: Gain 300 bonus Health (including components). Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 10% of their maximum health as true damage over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

name: Mage Emblem
description: The holder gains the Mage trait.

name: Revel Emblem
description: The holder gains the Revel trait.

name: Hand Of Justice
description: Grant 2 effects: +15 Attack Damage and 15% Ability Power, Attacks and Abilities heal for 15% of damage dealt. Each round, randomly increase 1 of these effects by 30%.

name: Edge of Night
description: Unique: Once per combat: At 50% Health, the holder briefly becomes untargetable and sheds negative effects. Then they gain 30% bonus Attack Speed.

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: +15% Mana

name: Negatron Cloak
description: +20 Magic Resist

name: Titan Resolve
description: Gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power when attacking or taking damage. After stacking 25 times, gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist!

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Grant 10 bonus Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the holder's Attack Damage as physical damage.

name: Guardian Emblem
description: The holder gains the Guardian trait.

name: B.F. Sword
description: +10 Attack Damage

name: Sparring Gloves
description: +5% Crit Chance, +10% Dodge Chance

name: Bloodthirster
description: Damage heals the holder for 25% of the damage dealt. Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

name: ZzRot Portal
description: Combat start: taunt enemies within 4 hexes. On death, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

name: Scalescorn Emblem
description: The holder gains the Scalescorn trait.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: Attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

name: Evoker Emblem
description: The holder gains the Evoker trait.

name: Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: Combat start: shield the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400 over 15 seconds. Aura item

name: Bruiser Emblem
description: The holder gains the Bruiser trait.

name: Dragonmancer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Dragonmancer trait.

name: Morellonomicon
description: Unique: Grant 30 bonus Ability Power (including components). Magic or true damage from an Ability burns the holder's target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description: Grant 50% bonus Attack Speed (including components) and 1 Attack Range. Attacks cannot miss.

name: Last Whisper
description: Unique: Dealing physical damage reduces the target’s Armor by 50% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: Unique: Grant 10% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 40 bonus Ability Power. Magic and true damage from an Ability can critically strike.

name: Giants Belt
description: +150 Health

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: +10 Ability Powerr

name: Dragon Blessing
description: Use on a Dragonmancer to make them your Dragonmancer Hero.

name: Shimmerscale Emblem
description: The holder gains the Shimmerscale trait.

name: Quicksilver
description: Unique: Grants 20% bonus Attack Speed. Combat start: immune to crowd control for 15 seconds.

name: Deathblade
description: Grant 40/60/80 bonus Attack Damage (including components).

name: Chalice of Power
description: Combat start: grant 30 Ability Power to the holder and 2 adjacent allies in the same row. Aura item

name: Ragewing Emblem
description: The holder gains the Ragewing trait.

name: Warmogs Armor
description: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Grant 15% bonus Attack Speed. Every 3rd attack shocks 4 enemies for 70 magic damage and reduces their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: Damage heals the holder, and the lowest Health ally, for 25% of the damage dealt.
